import { useState } from "react"; const UserForm = ({ checkMaster, authorizedUser, setFirstName, setLastName, setRole, setLanguage, setEmail, setOldPassword, setPassword, setConfirmPassword, loading, firstName, lastName, role, language, email, page }) => { const [oldPasswordType, setOldPasswordType] = useState(false); const [passwordType, setPasswordType] = useState(false); const [password2Type, setPassword2Type] = useState(false); return ( <>
setFirstName(e.target.value)} />
setLastName(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
{page === "register" && <>
setOldPassword(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} />
}
); }; export default UserForm;
